title: What herbal supplement helps dizziness?
description: Answer (1 of 12): Question: What herbal supplement helps dizziness? What can help depends on what the cause of your dizziness is. If it is caused by low blood pressure usually increasing salt and water intake will help. If it is caused by vertigo taking ginkgo biloba may help. If it caused by...
